name: Society for Strategy Technology & Delivery for Development
briefDescription: We (www.stadd.org) work in the fields of rural development, livelihoods, markets, and water. Our focus is on the cause of the marginalised, women and smallholder rainfed farmers in particular with an extended involvement in agriculture on two fronts, (i) Conservation Agriculture (CA) and, (ii) Water for Agriculture (more recent). We have earlier conducted national consultations for 3 years in a row under the banner of SPIRIT (Sustainable & Participative Initiative for Rural Infrastructure Technologies), and are engaging ourselves to manage a watershed project in Himachal.We have been interacting at the regional and global scale with NARS and CG institutions on aspects of advocacy, policy, and field initiatives on the subject of CA.
